wikipedia_page.main: Edward Ernest Bennett (22 August 1925 – 23 August 2018) was an English footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He competed for Great Britain at the 1952 Summer Olympics.

response: * Ted Bennett – Played for QPR and Watford, was an England amateur goalkeeper and represented Great Britain at the 1952 Olympics in Helsinki.
* Ted Bennett (Queens Park Rangers, Watford, Great Britain, England amateur)
* Ted Bennett (footballer) (Edward Ernest Bennett, born 1925), English footballer
* 23 August 2018: Ted Bennett, 93, Great Britain, Queens Park Rangers and Watford goalkeeper.
